00014 bool getModes(cmd_word *word, mode *destMode, mode *sourceMode)
00015 {
00016         switch (word->codage.mode) {
00017                 case REGREG:
00018                         *destMode = REGISTER;
00019                         *sourceMode = REGISTER;
00020                         break;
00021                 case REGIMM:
00022                         *destMode = REGISTER;
00023                         *sourceMode = IMMEDIATE;
00024                         break;
00025                 case REGDIR:
00026                         *destMode = REGISTER;
00027                         *sourceMode = DIRECT;
00028                         break;
00029                 case REGIND:
00030                         *destMode = REGISTER;
00031                         *sourceMode = INDIRECT;
00032                         break;
00033                 case DIRIMM:
00034                         *destMode = DIRECT;
00035                         *sourceMode = IMMEDIATE;
00036                         break;
00037                 case DIRREG:
00038                         *destMode = DIRECT;
00039                         *sourceMode = REGISTER;
00040                         break;
00041                 case INDIMM:
00042                         *destMode = INDIRECT;
00043                         *sourceMode = IMMEDIATE;
00044                         break;
00045                 case INDREG:
00046                         *destMode = INDIRECT;
00047                         *sourceMode = REGISTER;
00048                         break;
00049                 default:
00050                         logm("Invalid adressing mode", 0);
00051                         return false;
00052         }
00053         return true;
00054 }

00082 char* disassemble(size_t length, const cmd_word words[])
00083 {
00084         char *buffer = malloc(length * sizeof(char) * MAX_INSTR_PRINT_SIZE);
00085         for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)
00086         {
00087                 cmd_word currentWord = words[length];
00088                 appendName(buffer, currentWord);
00089                 strcpy(buffer, "\t");
00090                 switch (currentWord.codage.mode) {
00091                         //whole command is 1 word long
00092                         case REGREG:
00093                         case REGIND:
00094                                 break;
00095                                 
00096                         //whole command is 2 words long
00097                         case REGIMM:
00098                         case REGDIR:
00099                         case DIRREG:
00100                         case INDREG:
00101                                 break;
00102                                 
00103                         //whole command is 3 words long
00104                         case DIRIMM:
00105                         case INDIMM:
00106                                 break;
00107                         default:
00108                                 logm("Invalid adressing mode", 0);
00109                                 return false;
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         return buffer;
00113 }
